title:
NinaWitch
Ritual
subtitle: Ritual designed exclusively for you
priceNotice:
Price: Contact for details. Pricing varies
depending on your wishes and personal story.
note:
Note:
All accepted cases will go through a review process to ensure
your story aligns with the benevolent purpose that NiNa
upholds. Requests that may negatively impact the blessings or
spiritual integrity of either side will not be accepted.
section1content:
There are desires that cannot be spoken with words.
There are knots that cannot be untied by reason.
There are paths that only rituals can reveal.

"If you feel the calling
I will be the one to open the gate for you."
section1bottom:
This ritual is a unique energy ceremony, handcrafted
by NiNawitch — based on the energy, intentions, and
timing of each individual receiving it.
section1button: I am ready to step into the ritual.
section2content:
What is the NiNawitch Ritual?
• A ritual crafted uniquely for you never mass-produced.
• Based on: your personal energy goals (love, healing,
attraction, etc.), the optimal timing
(aligned with lunar cycles and cosmic energies), and the
intuitive guidance of NiNawitch.
• After the ritual is completed, you will receive:
• A special spell, potion, oil, or a personalized Sigil
Grimoire (depending on the energy focus of each cycle,
NiNa will adjust and send you the item that best suits your
current needs).
section3content:
Who Should Step into This Ritual?
• You are preparing to transition into a new chapter
of your life.
• You feel "out of alignment" and seek to reconnect.
• You wish to cleanse negative energies
that are blocking you.
• You are in love, in pain, or in fear and need
a ritual of healing.
• Or... you simply feel,
"I need something something I cannot yet name."
section5dob: Date of Birth (lunar or solar)
section5question1:
What do you wish to manifest
through this ritual?
section5question2: What do you sense is standing in your way?
section5button: Send the ritual into the universe
section6content:
Closing – The Final Whisper
A ritual is a meeting between your soul and the higher
realms of energy.
I do not promise miracles — but if your heart is true, the
ritual will guide you to where you are meant to be.
